attributes.action: Remove the Manchester City Council bylaws and allow Skateboarding in the city
attributes.additional_details: Skateboarding takes youths out of trouble, out of gangs and into a positive and creative community. Skateboarders don’t go out and carry knives, don’t go out to pick fights, they don’t wish to harm anyone, they just want to SKATE. Why disturb the peace?
attributes.background: Skateboarding is huge part of Manchester’s culture and people come from all over to skate here. No matter how many skate parks are built, the streets will always be where it belongs. It is a creative, non-violent activity which brings the community together. It harms nobody. Theres no need for a ban

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for the local authority in Manchester.

You could start a petition using Manchester City Council's petition site:
